demo.title: Demo page
demo.description: This page was created solely to illustrate site navigation and avoid 404 errors. It does not contain real content about EatSprint's history, as this is an academic demonstration project.

project.title: EatSprint Project
project.description: EatSprint is a food delivery application developed as part of an educational project. The main objective is to demonstrate the following technical skills:

features.architecture: Nuxt 4 architecture with optimized SSR and CSR
features.stateManagement: State management with Pinia and authentication
features.design: Modern design with Tailwind CSS v4

testAccounts.title: Test accounts
testAccounts.description: To test the different roles of the application:

empty.description: You haven't placed any orders yet. Discover our restaurants and order your favorite dishes!
